==== Major Contributions to OSS in the past ====
* Speaker at many Open Source conferences, and the FSF.hu roadshows for years

* Drupal.hu co-admin, and member of translation team 
* Founder, admin, and developer of gimp.hu - the Hungarian GIMP community site
